items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t know what the homework assignment is.
My guess is that Tom isn\'t going to want to sing.
Please don\'t accuse me of something I didn\'t do.
Tom spilled a cup of coffee all over his keyboard.
Tom stole a car in Boston and drove it to Chicago.
Tom stood in front the mirror, looking at himself.
If you want to be happy, make somebody else happy.
Tom certainly knows a thing or two about business.
Tom told me he thought that Mary would be curious.
I can\'t understand why Tom would want to do that.
